description: Operators that can generate large amounts of SP for other operators

archetto: Incredible recovery for all offensive recovery operators
ptilopsis: Passive SP generation and not many requirements for it too

bagpipe: Boosts for vanguards, especially enabling fast flagbearer strategies
warfarin: Small SP battery when enemies in range are killed
saria: Small SP battery when giving heals

ch_en: Small auto sp battery for offensive/defensive recovery
